delta:
Understood — I will not delete anything until you explicitly approve. Before I prepare deletion steps, please tell me:

1. Exactly what to delete (file names or full paths, or a clear description).  
2. Where it is (local PC, external drive, cloud service—specify provider).  
3. Whether you have a backup and whether you want permanent deletion (irreversible) or move to trash/recycle bin.  
4. Any account or device access details needed (I won't ask for passwords here; if you need commands I will tell you how to run them).

When you’re ready to proceed, confirm by replying with the exact phrase:
CONFIRM DELETE — [short label for the data]
(Replace [short label for the data] with a few words identifying what to delete.)

I will only proceed after receiving that exact confirmation. Would you like to provide the details now?
